name: Kitchen Crab
description:
Description: 

In Kitchen Crab, you play as a small crab attempting to escape his fate of being cooked. He has been blessed with magic powers to aid him in his escape quest. In this single-player platformer game, you run and jump through the game’s levels while fighting against the rodents in the kitchen. Evade the kitchen appliances that would spell your doom and eventually you’ll come face to face with the head chef of the kitchen. Defeat him in combat and escape back to the ocean.

Controls:

WASD - Movement/aiming

Space - Jump/double jump while in the air

P - Cast magic in the direction you are facing

Credits:

Producer - Kaleb (Luna) Wilkes

Programmers - Dakota Kantner & Victor Pontes

Art Designer - Shyanne French

Sound Designer - Michael Shaughnessy
